header.title: CosNotifyChannelAdmin_SequenceProxyPushConsumer

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosNotifyChannelAdmin::SequenceProxyPushConsumer interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosNotification/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: connect_sequence_push_supplier(SequenceProxyPushConsumer, PushSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Connect a supplier to the proxy

desc.p: This operation connects a PushSupplier to the target object. If a connection already exists the AlreadyConnected exception is raised.

func.name: push_structured_events(SequenceProxyPushConsumer, EventBatch) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Push a structured event to the proxy

desc.p: A client must use this operation when it wishes to push a new sequence of events to the target object. If no connection exists the Disconnected exception is raised.

func.name: disconnect_sequence_push_consumer(SequenceProxyPushConsumer) -> ok
func.fsummary: Close connection and terminate the proxy

desc.p: This operation cause the target object to close the connection and terminate.
